column4: can someone help me with a java issue? Something apparently went missing after an upgrade
that's why I stuck with karmic
can someone help me with a JRE problem?
why are you stuck with karmic? that is so old, java doesn't care about it anymore
too many annoyances with the new versions
how would you know without having the recent versions
okay, so specifics. I wanna run minecraft, and it usually did this by executing it with cautious-launcher
so I can't run any java programs
I know how to run a program from terminal
I'm just saying I don't know what to run the .jar with
the open with javasdk or something
u might not have it and have been using openjdk the whole time
are u sure you haven't been using something else the whole time other that cautious-launcher?
that's what the command for "run with sun java runtime" was
